comment.author: 30937372@N00
comment._content: The caption to this could be correct. It's not State House Lusaka. The road layout is all wrong

comment.author: 59350149@N07
comment._content: I think this is Government House and the road is the Ridgeway Lusaka

comment.author: 59362370@N05
comment._content: Yes this is the Secretariate on the Ridgeway looking twards the East. the double road lead to the Woodlands roundabout. The barracks would be to the right.

comment.author: 59430401@N06
comment._content: This is a side view of the buiding known before indpendence as the Secretariate, the Lusaka centre of the Provincial and District Commisssioner system called the Provincial Adminiatration.

comment.author: 30937372@N00
comment._content: Whatever it is, it's definitely not State House (Government House) Lusaka. Independence Avenue (The Ridgeway as it then was) does not take a left bend into a wide double boulevard like that. And the structure of the building is completely wrong.
